heading: HB03982
0: AN ACT MERGING THE PHILIPPINE CARABAO CENTER AND THE NATIONAL DAIRY AUTHORITY INTO THE PHILIPPINE DAIRY DEVELOPMENT AGENCY TO PROVIDE GREATER FOCUS ON THE ACCELERATED DEVELOPMENT OF THE DAIRY INDUSTRY AND TO INCREASE PRODUCTION OF DAIRY ANIMALS IN THE PHILIPPINES, PROVIDING FOR A RUMINANTS DEVELOPMENT FUND THEREFORE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2016-10-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03982
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MERGING THE PHILIPPINE CARABAO CENTER AND THE NATIONAL DAIRY AUTHORITY INTO THE PHILIPPINE DAIRY DEVELOPMENT AGENCY TO PROVIDE GREATER FOCUS ON THE ACCELERATED DEVELOPMENT OF THE DAIRY INDUSTRY AND TO INCREASE PRODUCTION OF DAIRY ANIMALS IN THE PHILIPPINES, PROVIDING FOR A RUMINANTS DEVELOPMENT FUND THEREFORE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

DATE FILED : 2016-10-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
